title: Web3Shop | Powered by Lab3
description: Next generation of Web3 Social E-commerce

openGraph.title: Web3Shop | Powered by Lab3
openGraph.description: Web3shop is an e-commerce platform built specifically for web3. We plan to bring designers and users together in a community to design and produce merch together, creating new social relationships and injecting incentive models for social commerce. Web3shop will do away with the drawbacks of web2 e-commerce, returning benefits and power to users, and expanding social commerce by the network to capture growth.
